scene_description_enriched: Within a circular frame, two men are depicted sowing seeds in a field. The man in the foreground wears a red tunic over grey leggings and a white pouch slung over his shoulder, from which he is scattering seeds. A sack filled with seeds rests beside him. The second man, further back, wears a grey tunic and green leggings, also scattering seeds. The background shows a landscape with trees and a cloudy sky. The scene is framed by a decorative border featuring a large illuminated initial 'M' and blue flowers on a pink ground.
